_comment: Seed configurations for C-vs-JS comparison test infrastructure.

map_seeds._comment: Seeds for map-only sessions (JS gen_typ_grid.js --sessions, C gen_map_sessions.py). Each seed generates levels 1-5 by default.

with_rng._comment: Seeds that include per-level RNG traces for debugging. These are themeroom seeds and other cases that have been difficult to align between C and JS.

session_seeds._comment: Seeds for full gameplay sessions (C run_session.py). Each entry has a move sequence.

chargen_seeds._comment: Character creation sessions (C gen_chargen_sessions.py). One session per role, all using the same seed. Keys: role/race/gender/align menu accelerators.
